```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidycensus)
library(tidyverse)
library(tigris)
```


```{r NJ, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Read in the congregational data (from 2010)
cong <- read.csv("U.S. Religion Census Religious Congregations and Membership Study, 2010 (County File).csv")

```

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
cong <- cong %>%
  select(CountyFIPS, TOTCNG, TOTRATE) 
cong$CountyFIPS <- as.character(cong$CountyFIPS)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE, collapse = TRUE,}
# get the shapefile
options(tigris_class = "sf")
nj_counties<- counties(state="NJ", cb=T, year=2010)
nj_counties$cofips <- substr(nj_counties$GEO_ID, 10,15)

nj_cong <- geo_join(nj_counties, cong, by_sp="cofips", by_df="CountyFIPS")

```
